name: Diamond Hunter (itch)
description:
Game Description and Story:
Diamond Hunter is a Top Down, 2D, Arcade-Maze-Game in which you play Borim the Dwarf who tries to collect as many gems as he can to become a proud dwarf.
He enrolled in an international Mining-Tournament with all kinds of competitors, but what he didn't expect, was that Archibald van Schneck the evil slug had his eyes on Borim.
As he enteres the cave he meets Archibald who tries to steal his gems.

Gameplay:
As Borim you have to collect the gems which are scattered across the level.
Gems you collect get added to a trail which follows your every move.
When you have collected at least 5 gems, the hatch opens and you can leave the level.
But Archibald doesn't want to let you go so he tries to steal your gems from your trail or to hit and defeat you.
To keep Archibald away from him, Borim brought some dynamite which you can use to blow up Archibald and make him reset to his spawnposition.



Minimum specs:
The game uses the minimum specs of games made with Unity.

  • OS: Windows XP SP2+, Mac OS X 10.9+, Ubuntu 12.04+, SteamOS+.
  • Graphics card: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities.
  • CPU: SSE2 instruction set support.
